define.majl-kai: The Majl-Kai is the advisorary council to the Pharaoh of Anabi. It contains 6 members, the heads of each of the Great Families
define.collapse: The Collapse was a point in history where the Planes of Existance fell and intersected with the Prime Material Plane. All written history before this point was lost
define.bc: BC or Before Collapse is the period of history before the Collapse occured
define.ac: AC or After Collapse is the period of history after the Collapse occured
define.annum: An annum is a time period consisting of 365 days
define.centinnium: A centinnium is a time period consisting of 100 years
define.ao: Ao is the name of the planet that humans populate. The name is derived from the Kariaga word for ground
define.anabi: Anabi is the second largest country on Ao
define.tps: The Planar System is used to describe the different layers or plans of existance. Though each plane is supposed to be separate, they still maintain a metaphysical connect through which energy is transfered
define.the-intersect: The Intersects are the point on Ao where the Planes Aarukatsu and Duyat meet the Prime Material Plane. Through the Intersects the separate planes have physical access points into each other
define.aarukatsu: Aarukatsu or the Plane of Reeds is the name given to one of the planes that intersected with the Prime Material Plane. It is where Taqa is sourced
define.duyat: Duyat or the Plane without Stars is the name given to one of the planes that intersected with the Prime Material Plane. It is where Rih is sourced
define.taqa: Taqa is the energy that originated from Aarukatsu. It can be used along side Taqago and a conduit to create spontatious effect akin to magic
define.taqago: Taqago is the language used to program Taqa to produce an effect
define.rih: Rih is the energy that originated from Duyat. It can be used along side Rihgo and a conduit to create spontatious effect akin to magic. Prolonged usage alters the user's physicality
define.rihgo: Rihgo is the language used to program Rih to produce an effect
define.jadeage: The Jade Age is the period where humans discovered how to use jade as a conduit for Taqa. This period ends on the discovery of lapis lazuli's use with Rih
define.sekhmet-no-rih: Sekhmet'no'Rih is the name of the desert that was a result of the Duyat Intersect
define.yokai: Yokai are the name for the creatures that emerged from Duyat
define.obake: Obake are a type of Yokai that have the ability to change form between an animal and a human
define.discovering: The Discovering is the name of the period that started when humanity discovered they could utilize the energy of the planes that intersected
define.industrial-boom: The Industrial Boom is the name of the period where humans started developing new technology at a rapid rate
define.taking: The Taking is the name of the period where countries shut down their borders to limit access to the planar energies in hopes to capitalise on it
define.conflict: The Conflict is the name of the period that lead up to and includes the Aoen War, the fight for access to planar energy. It ends with the Te Rangi Intervention
define.ao-war: The Aoen was a period of 22 annums where countries fought for control of the Intersects
define.cobalt-war: The Cobalt War started when Anabi declined the rest of Ao access to Duyat. It is still ongoing
define.terangi-intertervention: The Te Rangi Intervention was led by Kariaga and declared that planar energy was a basic human right that everyone shall have access to. This was signed by every country excluding Anabi
